description: Curate and share inspiring mental health stories on social media. Join and moderate Twitter discussions using designated hashtags. Create and edit short video content that promotes mental health awareness. Respond to online comments and messages to foster a safe, supportive digital space. Help schedule posts and coordinate content calendars.

Assist in setting up and managing booths, stage areas, and activity zones. Facilitate group discussions, games, or workshops that promote mental health education. Distribute flyers and educational materials to event participants. Serve as event marshals or guides to ensure a smooth program flow. Capture photos and testimonials during events for future promotions.

Represent the organization during meetings with partner groups or sponsors. Help in coordinating outreach and follow-up with potential collaborators. Organize networking events and manage RSVP lists and guest communication. Draft partnership proposals or assist in pitch presentations. Maintain a database of partner organizations, contacts, and activities.
